template.currentUserDescription: Show the calendar of the current logged in user
template.userSearchDescription: Show a calendar of a specific user
template.groupCalendarDescription: Show a calendar of an Outlook group
template.resourceCalendarDescription: Show a room or resource calendar
template.jiraProjectsAsEventsDescripion: Show Jira project issues using any date field (e.g. due date)
template.jiraFiltersAsIssuesDescripion: Show Jira issues from a filter, using any date field
template.jiraJQLAsIssuesDescripion: Show Jira issues from a JQL query, using any date field

officeCategoryColorSettings.useCategoryColorSubHeading: Show events with the category color instead of the calendar color

officeCalendarSharingSettings.calendarSharingSubHeading: Choose who can access the calendar
officeCalendarSharingSettings.unsharedDescription: User with access to this page can access the calendar
officeCalendarSharingSettings.sharedDescription: Users with existing permissions can access the calendar

officeEditPermissionSettings.fullPermissionsDescription: Users can create and edit events in this calendar
officeEditPermissionSettings.meetingRequestDescription: Users can add events by sending a meeting requests to this calendar
officeEditPermissionSettings.viewOnlyDescription: Users cannot create or edit any events in this calendar

officeEventDetailsSettings.fullDetailsDescription: Users can see all details of events
officeEventDetailsSettings.titleAndLocationDescription: Users can only see title and location of events
officeEventDetailsSettings.freeBusyDescription: Users see events as busy/available only

jiraCalendarSharingSettings.unsharedDescription: User with access to this page can access the calendar
jiraCalendarSharingSettings.sharedDescription: Users with existing permissions can access the calendar

jiraDateRangeOptionSettings.dateRangeOptionSubHeading: Choose how the releases appear in the calendar
jiraDateRangeOptionSettings.startToReleaseDateSubHeading: Display the release as a timeframe
jiraDateRangeOptionSettings.releaseDateOnlySubHeading: Display the release as a single day event
jiraDateRangeOptionSettings.customRangeSubHeading: Customize how the release is displayed

jiraLoginScreen.heading: Jira Login
jiraLoginScreen.subHeading: To show dates from Jira, please sign in with your Jira account.

officeLoginScreen.heading: Microsoft login
officeLoginScreen.subHeading: To show Outlook calendars, please sign in with your Microsoft account.
